text: Hermann "Tiger" Gerland (born 4 June 1954) is a German professional football manager and former player who worked as an assistant coach of Bundesliga club Bayern Munich. == Playing career == Born in Bochum, Gerland spent his entire professional career from 1972 to 1984 playing at VfL Bochum. He played as a striker until 1975, when he switched to defence, where he played until the end of his career.
